Articles.Content:
Suddenly, the building regenerates mysteriously, and every floor including floor 1967, 1968, and 1969 are repaired.

Meanwhile, on floor 1966, you wander infinitely in a funhouse maze. But the Very Tall Building gods decide this is too long and they teleport you to th 1967th floor.

Edited November 8, 2017 by Gyrfalcon5
stuff and things
floor 1967: a hanger, with the door open. a glider is on a ramp in the middle. you jump on, escaping the building.

Turns out that due to severe dilation, you end up on the next floor still.

Floor 1968 : A floor of car dealership, full of similar but horrible cars of different badges, yet the TVs claim they're a single group. Avoiding the salesman by "going to the back" accuse, you found the stair and moved on, upwards...
1969: the eaon worm.
1970. The entire floor falls down, and you fall down all the floors to floor number one, filled with infinite horrors.
you can only go up!

On 23/11/2017 at 5:37 AM, DunaManiac said:

1970. The entire floor falls down, and you fall down all the floors to floor number one, filled with infinite horrors.

... or did you ?

You end up on a floor similar to what you remembered of floor 1 long, long ago. But the people says it's floor 1971 really, not floor 1.

Well, there's only one way to find out...
floor 1972: You suddenly find a magic elevator, and get in- however it suddenly transforms, you get out, and quickly grab on Jebediahs SRB to go up, but then you let go at floor 1973.
Floor 1973 you see infinity
Floor 1974. Infinity sees you.
1975: You are on EVA supervising the connection of a a Mk1-2 command pod and a weird thing built of two spherical things and a fuel tank. Shuddering, you jet toward the next portal.
1976: You find Viking 1 and 2, how they ended up on this floor is a mystery. Rather than ponder this, you continue upwards...
1977: A weird Mk 4 ship lies on a massive airliner,with excitement you run up the stairs to the plane, but land on the next floor instead.
Floor 1979. The appointment of a strong woman to top powers. Seems really crowded to go upstairs though, but keep going...
Floor 1980: This room is backed with people to the point where the room could possibly collapse into a black hole. Moving on...

Floor 1981. This time, the bird really, actually, TRULY becomes the absolute word.

Edited December 6, 2017 by Matuchkin

1982:  You come across something bizarre scrawled on the wall:  "I know your FACE. A VISION was vouchsafed to me. You will bring the TRUTH. They see me WATCHING THEM but they do not know. Lies and TRUTH, lies and TRUTH. I will find you soon.'"

For some unknown reason, this makes you shiver....you continue upward, ever upward.

Hey I'm back

1983: The world is utopian and you shudder just thinking about what the next floor will inevitably be

1984: Oh. Never mind. GUESS THE WORLD'S COMMUNIST NOW. WHATEVER HAPPENED TO THAT OTHER BOOK.

Edited December 6, 2017 by Matuchkin
1985:  Mikhail Gorbachev becomes General Secretary of the Soviet Communist Party and de facto leader of the Soviet Union. This *IS* the "other book"!
1986: This floor features an SRB firing into a nuclear reactor. As you hurry past them, you see hundreds of documentaries being made.

1987: you briefly see a sneak-peek of floor gg(64), before appearing back in floor 1988.

Edited December 8, 2017 by Matuchkin
1988: The Super Mario Bros 2 floor, where it's just a place to play the game, considering it's been released in 1988.
